text: {{Infobox Writer | name = Eoin Colfer | image = Eoin_Colfer.jpg | caption = Colfer at Great St Mary's Cambridge | birth_date = | birth_place = Wexford, Ireland | nationality = Irish | occupation = Writer | genre = Fantasy, Adventure, Science fiction, Children's literature | movement = | notableworks = Artemis Fowl | signature = Eoin colfer signature.png | website = }} Eoin Colfer (born 14 May 1965) is an Irish author. He is most well known as the author of the Artemis Fowl books.
